CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 23, 1965, pg. 7 reads: " Mr. and Mrs. Harper Thornhill - Harris Photo" Portion of accompanying article reads: "Chatman-Thornhill Nuptials Held in Stouts' Home - Married recently in a double-ring ceremony held at the home of Mr. and Mrs. Lawrence Stout of Hyatt St., were Karen Chatman, the niece of the Stouts, and Harper Thornhill, son of Mrs. Lillie Thornhill of Baxter St.."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of groom Harper Thornhill and bride Karen Chatman Thornhill, holding hands in home of Mr. and Mrs. Lawrence Stout, Hyatt Street
